lines.text: Isn't that the freshest, juciest blueberry pie you've ever tasted?
You see, it's all done with a little bit of scientific magic. Every single blueberry is coated with a thick layer of goat embryonic fluid...
The last thing we need is a biotech panic about chickens!
The earth was not made for us - she was made for the dinosaurs.
I just want some peace and quiet.
